name: Go See The Fireworks
description:
This game is just the simple journey of a dude at home that wants to go see the fireworks.

Entry to the 2019 New Years Jam! The theme for this jam was "Fireworks".

This is my first jam!  I'm still pretty new to game development; and while this game might be simple, I learned a lot working on it!

Controls: Use arrow keys to move. When necessary, press [space] to interact with environment.
